key.name: queue
key.description: Queue name for this server. Utility providing ITaskQueue with this name should be registered.

key.name: concurrent_limit
key.description: Maximum concurrent task limit. This should be less than zserver-thread or just 1.

key.name: retry_max_count
key.description: Maximum retry count for ZPublisher. Once the limit has been exceeded, task may be permanently skipped.
